column6: "ORIGINS AND ENDINGS" Part 1 (of 5) Left shaken at ground zero after the cataclysmic events of HOUSE OF M, Logan has no choice but to soldier on, as he has done so many times before - but has the burden now become too great? In his lifetime, Logan has been both a hero and a villain, a player and a pawn... but what is he now?
column8: | letterer:Randy Gentile | colorist:Paul Mounts | penciller:Javier Saltares | inker:Mark Texeira | writer:Daniel Way
